text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Are you ready? Then let's begin.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However small the step, we must get<n>closer to perfecting
the winning<n>equation... There's nothing left to do<n>but
recalculate, revise, and<n>reformulate!

With the task of running in Narita<n>Brian's place left to her,
Biwa<n>Hayahide is determined to race in the<n>Sprout Kinen.

However, given the high expectations<n>for Brian, this sudden
change is sure<n>to disappoint her fans.
But the erudite racer continues<n>onward, undeterred.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Though, to be honest, I would be lying<n>if I said I wasn't
worried.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I have hope... There are people<n>who believe I can prove
my theory<n>and complete the winning equation.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And what kind of big sister would I be<n>if I could not even
keep a promise to<n>my sister?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That reminds me. Let me know if all<n>this brainstorming is
making you feel<n>hungry.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I happen to have some curry I<n>prepared last night.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, the diced vegetables stewed<n>quite nicely... It's a
nutritious curry that<n>even picky eaters would enjoy.

Unable to resist the offer, we chow<n>down while working on
the equation,<n>and time flies by.

It's the day of the Sprout Kinen. Under<n>a perfectly clear sky,
a throng of<n>spectators come to the track to see<n>the big
race.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Good morning. The weather and wind<n>speed appear
satisfactory.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I am in ideal shape to perform at my<n>best. Still...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'd like one final strategy meeting<n>with you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I have a complete rundown on our<n>opponents. The focus will
be on two in<n>particular.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We should expect the local favorite,<n>Through Passport, to be
a skilled front<n>runner. That was her running style for<n>each
of the past twelve scrimmages,<n>you see.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And Titan Frypan will make a definite<n>move from the center.
The likelihood<n>of a late surge approach is incredibly<n>high.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Their caution and mental strength are<n>rather... comparable to
Brian's.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Perfect opponents? Hahaha, you sure<n>are confident. One
might even say<n>optimistic.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Though I suppose this daring<n>positivity of yours does help
ease my<n>tension.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's time... Shall we?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Brian... I hope you're watching.)

text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... All right! Watch mepick up the pace, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Young Brian
text_block_list.text: Wow! Me too, me too! I'm gonna<n>catch you, Sis!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
(Or since you left me behind already,<n>maybe you can't even
see me<n>anymore.)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Never mind... That doesn't matter<n>now.)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm going to show you... I'll make<n>you remember.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You'll remember what it was like<n>trailing behind me!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's fair blue skies today for the<n>Sprout Kinen! And these ten
leaders of<n>the next generation are sure going to<n>give us a
fantastic show!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (All right, an excellent start!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What's this?! Through Passport, the<n>experienced front
runner, is having<n>some trouble! She's dragging behind!<n>
What could be wrong?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Biwa Hayahide, subbing for<n>Narita Brian, is pushing to
the front!<n>Meanwhile, the highly anticipated<n>Titan Frypan
has a firm position in the<n>back!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The results will be proof that I'm<n>correct!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: My technique is my theory! The<n>winning equation!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're approaching the final corner!<n>And here comes Titan
Frypan! She's<n>flying around from the outside!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I won't let you overtake me now!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Look at this! Biwa Hayahide pulls<n>ahead! How does she
have the<n>stamina left after staying in front for<n>so long?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Watch me...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You'll be the one trying to keep up,<n>Brian!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide's leaving them<n>behind! What a tremendous
sprint!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide! It's Biwa Hayahide!<n>The big name of the
new generation is<n>Biwa Hayahide!
Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: First place. Well, not surprising.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: As expected of my big sis.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeeeaaah! BIWA HAYAHIDE! That<n>was an amazing race,
huh, Taishin?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: So damn loud... Go bother someone<n>else. I'm leaving.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh?! W-w-wait a sec! Where are<n>you going?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I have to train.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Gasp! I get it! Seeing Hayahidegot you all fired up! I know exactlyhow you feel!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm coming tooooo! It's training time!<n>Whoo-hooooo!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: That's not why... Hey! Quit following<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There... We've gotten the result we<n>were looking for.
choice_data_list:
That's one step closer to completing the
winning equation.

That's one step closer to completing the
winning equation.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Heheh... Indeed. But that meanswe still have a long way to go.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No matter though... We will get there,<n>eventually.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: With that said, let's head back and<n>get to work!

Our days of trying to perfect the<n>winning equation together
have<n>begun!
